mapper.update: update ujcms_dict_type set site_id_ = #{siteId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name_ = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, alias_ = #{alias,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark_ = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, scope_ = #{scope,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, order_ = #{order,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, sys_ = #{sys,jdbcType=BOOLEAN} where id_ = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into ujcms_dict_type (id_, site_id_, name_, alias_, remark_, scope_, order_, sys_) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{siteId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{alias,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scope,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{order,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{sys,jdbcType=BOOLEAN})
